ratings.comment: I came into mythology just for a literature credit course, but was instantly engaged to the material through the enthusiasm and interest Josh brought with him every lecture. He is a hilarious guy and makes the course interesting and worthwhile. Exams are easy as long as you read and pay attention! Essays are graded harder but TA's are there to help

Professor Smith was an amazing professor who has an obvious passion for mythology.  Coming into the class with no previous expectations or experience of myth, he was both engaging and entertaining, making his love of the topic contagious. His tests are easy, if you read the material.  Papers were a bit tougher. I would highly recommend this class

Josh is adorable and by far the best teacher I have ever had. He is super engaging and absolutely hilarious. He tells you what you need to know for the exams. The exams are easy if you actually read the books. TAKE THIS CLASS!!!

Professor Smith makes class really interesting. He keeps the class engaged and interested in the material by relating it to modern examples. He is very clear and covers the material well. Exams are very easy but papers a little more challenging. Overall great class, I would recommend it.
Josh is absolutely hilarious, and relates a lot of his lectures to pop culture and movies. He knows whats up, and lectures are always interesting.

This guy is absolutely the man. Genuinely knowledgeable and cares about the class but doesn't take himself too seriously in a good way. One of the funniest professors I've ever had. Discussion is mandatory but lecture is not. I'd highly recommend this class and teacher.
Be excited that you have Josh. Hes awesome.

josh is super helpful and nice and quirky and funny and cute. BUT the class was pretty hard and challenging. His tests and quizzes were difficult and there was usually homework due on the same day you had a quiz. Just be prepared to work very hard. He was nice to look at though
Very sharp and knowledgeable. Willing to answer questions while still makes sure to cover all the material.

Sweet in a vanilla way. Peculiarly effective memorization tactics (an accus. goes into a bar etc.)But seems susceptible to the Dark Side of teaching ie. attention/power going to his head. Yeah,kinda pallid-cute.

Josh is an excellent teacher, one of the best I've ever had. He challenges the class and still makes every day enjoyable, with his notable sense of humor. He is very diligent with assignments and grading, and goes above and beyond when it comes to making sure a student understands material.
This guy is hysterical!  He drops puns at the most random moments and continues to do so even when the class remains stoic.  He's pretty cute too.
